nodes.text: Rikkard was a Human male who served as a village speaker for the Lanteeban village of Torbel during the Clone Wars.

Rikkard appeared in Clone Wars Gambit: Siege (2010) by Karen Miller, an Australian author. To benefit victims of the 2009 Black Saturday brush fires in her native country, labeled the worst natural disaster in the state's history, Miller and another Star Wars author, Sean Williams, each auctioned off the opportunity to name a character in their respective upcoming novels. The winner of Miller's character decided to name him Rikkard.
